messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] spelling was: New to the list {Buzz}
messages.msgSnippet: We Canadians spell differently from the Americans too.  Colour for us has a U .
messages.messageBody:
We Canadians spell differently from the Americans too. "Colour" for us
has a "U".

joyfullearners wrote:
>
> bctswim@... wrote:
>
> > I always spelled color colour in school and
> > got it marked wrong but i thought it was prettier! Today my 5yo son asked for
> > the report card to put in the atm! i love this stuff and think life would be
> > pretty boring without it!
> > Bridget
>
> This has probably already been said (I've just come back from no mail),but, here
> in little ole New Zealand, we spell color - colour. We add in 'u' in a few other
> words as well. I agree, I think it's pretty too! Was it e.e.cummings who spelled
> things differently and didn't use capitals or apostrophes or anything like that?
> That would definitely be very interesting!
> Michele~*
> NZ.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] spelling was: New to the list {Buzz}
messages.msgSnippet: ... This has probably already been said (I ve just come back from no mail),but, here in little ole New Zealand, we spell color - colour. We add in u in a few
messages.messageBody:
bctswim@... wrote:

> I always spelled color colour in school and
> got it marked wrong but i thought it was prettier! Today my 5yo son asked for
> the report card to put in the atm! i love this stuff and think life would be
> pretty boring without it!
> Bridget

This has probably already been said (I've just come back from no mail),but, here
in little ole New Zealand, we spell color - colour. We add in 'u' in a few other
words as well. I agree, I think it's pretty too! Was it e.e.cummings who spelled
things differently and didn't use capitals or apostrophes or anything like that?
That would definitely be very interesting!
Michele~*
NZ.

messages.msgSnippet: me too - visuals are more important than rules :) adding the u looks nice. -susan
messages.messageBody:
me too - visuals are more important than rules :) adding the u looks nice.
-susan

> KIM

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] spelling was: New to the list {Buzz}
messages.msgSnippet: ... I realized that after I re-read it when it came into my in-box. MS brain fog  makes for creative spelling (MS=multiple sclerosis). Besides this is an
messages.messageBody:
J Salicos wrote:
>
> Buzz, Its spelled.... spelled not spelt lol
> Jill
>
> --- Darryl Klement <klement@...> wrote:
>
> >
> >I'm trying
> > very hard to get into the habit of telling them how
> > it's spelt or
> > explaining I don't know but we can look it up and
> > check.
> >
> > Buzz
> >

I realized that after I re-read it when it came into my in-box.
MS brain fog makes for creative spelling (MS=multiple sclerosis).

Besides this is an Unschooling list....spelling don't count ;-)

Buzz
